name: SlideNShoot
description:
SlideNshoot is fast paced 2d platformer-shooter. Your goal is to finish levels as quickly as possible.

SlideNshoot is still in development.

Keybinds:

a / d - right and left movement

L.shift - hold to slide

q / e / mouse wheel - change weapons

LMB - shoot

space - jump 

escape - go back

Tips:

Some enemies are made out of stronger materials - they have immunity to bullets, but are weak for explosions

same rule applies to the boss, his shield is broken by explosions, when his attacks change main body gets any damage you make.
